text: Oil well close to Berat, in Albania Albania is a country rich in petroleum and gas resources both on and offshore. The following is a list of oil and gas fields that are located in the country.Vendburimet e Naftës dhe Gazit == Oil and Gas fields == {| class="wikitable" style="margin-bottom: 1em; font-size: 85%;" |- !
